question: Who among the following was awarded Noble Price in economics in 2019 along with Abhijit Banerjee?
explanation: Esther Duflo was a French-American economist who won the Nobel Prize for Economics in 2019, alongside Abhijit Banerjee and Michael Kremer. It was in honor of their work in development economics in global poverty, where their methods have become standard. Duflo was the youngest person and the second woman to be awarded the Nobel Prize for Economics
